    • getValueByKey

      EvidenceResponseDto getValueByKey​(Long key)
      Search value in DataBase by key
      Parameters:
      key - Long for value search
      Returns:
      value from DataBase
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if key not found in DataBase

    • createEvidence

      Boolean createEvidence​(EvidenceRequestDto requestDto)
      Create new evidence
      Parameters:
      requestDto - DTO with new evidence
      Returns:
      true if evidence created, false if didn't created
      Throws:
      RequiredFieldIsEmptyException - if 'key' or 'value' fields in the requestDto is empty

      Throws:

    • createEvidenceFromCsv

      List<EvidenceResponseDto> createEvidenceFromCsv​(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
      Creating entity from csv file EvidenceCsvReader
      Parameters:
      file - file to read
      Returns:
      List of created entities
      Throws:
      InvalidFileFormatException - if file format is not CSV
      FileEmptyException - if file is empty

    • evidenceToCsv

      Boolean evidenceToCsv​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Write all entities to CSV file EvidenceCsvWriter
      Parameters:
      response - from controller
      Returns:
      true if writing is completed
      Throws:
      DataBaseIsEmptyException - if dataBase is empty
